content: Hey :) I've been away for a while and my pull requests https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-perf/pull/1215 and https://github.com/rust-lang/rustc-perf/pull/1225 have been dormant for two weeks. I'm back now and still interested in getting these merged. #1225 especially seems like it should be uncontroversial. Could someone have a look and let me know if there's still work to be done? @simulacrum @rylev Or let me know who I should ping to get this looked at? Thanks! :)
Yeah, these last three weeks have also been really busy for me - I intend to go through backlog over today and probably the weekend.
Ok thanks, sorry for bothering you again then, just making sure it didn't get forgotten :)
